items.label: 539f70d4ec4f024411ecdea7
items.description:
Available to qualifying senior citizen residential customers (see Senior Citizen Discount) in Southern View in single-dwelling units with single phase service taken through a single meter for domestic use, where an energy source other than electricity is used as the primary source for home heating. The customer is responsible for a minimum bill equal to the customer charge. The Senior Citizen Discount for regular residential electric customers in Southern View is equal to a 10% discount off the Winter and Summer Electric Rates charged under Rate 31. The discount is itemized and appears as a credit on the customer's monthly bill.

* Higher summer rates are effective from May 15 to September 14, with winter rates in effect from September 15 to May 14.
items.name: Regular Residential- Southern View Senior Citizen (Rate 32)
